# What is your Mobile ATO Prevention project?

In this section of the Appdome Knowledge Base, learn to build Certified Secure™ mobile anti-account takeover (ATO) protection in Android & iOS apps using Appdome's AI-Native mobile defense platform — all from within your mobile CI/CD pipeline. Use Appdome to fully automate the build, testing, release, and monitoring lifecycle of Android & iOS anti-ATO defense in mobile apps quickly. Prevent memory attacks, mobile trojans, accessibility service abuse, overlay attacks, session hijacking, MFA bypass, SIM swap fraud, and other ATO exploits. Detect and block threats targeting user credentials, account session data, and sensitive app resources in real time. Protect against automated attacks, bots, malicious SDKs, and fraud tools that compromise mobile identities and lead to financial loss. If you don't find what you're looking for in this section of the knowledge base, enter your inquiry in the search field or contact us at Appdome Support for assistance [support.appdome.com](https://support.appdome.com/).
